alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 22 at 10:25PM EDT until June 22 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM EDT FOR THOMAS COUNTY... At 1025 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Thomasville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Thomasville, Boston, Pavo, Coolidge, Barwick, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Dillon, Enon, Patten, Eason, Merrillville, Chastain, Dawesville, Newark, Pasco, Hollis and Oaklawn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
